resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106381</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106381</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202540</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Alcohol and Other Drugs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiritus und andere Drogen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Alcool et d'autres drogues</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Álcool e outras drogas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Alcool ed altre droghe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οινόπνευμα και άλλα ναρκωτικά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Alcohol y otras drogas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson addresses the harmful effects of alcohol, tobacco, and illicit drugs on a young person's body. It also covers the primary reasons why students try illicit drugs.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion adressiert die schädlichen Effekte 
von Spiritus, von Tabak und von unerlaubten Drogen auf einem Körper 
der jungen Person. Sie umfaßt auch die Primärgründe, warum 
Kursteilnehmer unerlaubte Drogen versuchen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon adresse les effets nocifs de 
l'alcool, du tabac, et des drogues illicites sur un corps du jeune. 
Elle couvre également les raisons primaires pour lesquelles les
étudiants essayent les drogues illicites.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição dirige-se aos efeitos prejudiciais do
álcool, do tabaco, e de drogas illicit em um corpo de pessoa nova. 
Cobre também as razões preliminares porque os estudantes 
tentam drogas illicit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione richiama gli effetti nocivi di 
alcool, di tabacco e delle droghe illecite su un corpo del giovane. 
Egualmente riguarda le ragioni per le quali principali gli 
allievi provano le droghe illecite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα εξετάζει τα επιβλαβή αποτελέσματα του 
οινοπνεύματος, του καπνού, και των παράνομων ναρκωτικών στο σώμα 
ενός νεαρού ατόμου. Καλύπτει επίσης τους αρχικούς λόγους 
για τους οποίους οι σπουδαστές δοκιμάζουν τα παράνομα φάρμακα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección trata los efectos dañosos del 
alcohol, del tabaco, y de las drogas ilícitas en un cuerpo de la 
persona joven. También cubre las razones primarias por las que 
los estudiantes intentan las drogas ilícitas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:TINA HARTIG
FN:TINA HARTIG
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202540</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106381</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/alcohol-and-other-drugs</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
